title: Process occurring in heating curve segment

content.question: Which of the following best describes the process occurring from point B to point C on the heating curve shown?

choices.label: The average kinetic energy of the particles in the system is increasing as the substance melts.
The average kinetic energy of the particles in the system is increasing as the substance boils.
The potential energy of the particles in the system is increasing as the substance melts.
The potential energy of the particles in the system is increasing as the substance boils.

content.answer: The potential energy of the particles in the system is increasing as the substance melts.
